attributes.action: Cancel Christmas till the COVID Vaccine is Available.
attributes.additional_details:
Come on England !!!
Let’s Cancel Christmas till the Vaccine is available,we should support our NHS Workers.Our Emergency Services.Our Military and all those who work on Christmas Day and sacrifice seeing their loved ones to Keep the Wheels of this Great Country turning and Ultimately SAVE LIVES !!!

We are British ! We are Strong and we are Resilient! Let’s pull together and beat this Virus !!! 

IT’S ONLY ONE DAY BRITAIN !!! Let’s not undo what we have done !!!
attributes.background:
Cancel Christmas till the COVID Vaccine is Available.
Let’s support our NHS Workers,Our Emergency Services,Our Military and all those who sacrifice Christmas Day for Us !

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/553660
